      • isKeyDown

        public static boolean isKeyDown(int keycode)
        Usable to determine if a certain key is currently pressed.
        Parameters:
        keycode - The keycode to check for being currently pressed.
        Returns:
        True if the key specified by keycode is currently pressed, false otherwise.
